text: The 1983 U.S. Women's Open was the 38th U.S. Women's Open, held July 28–31 at Cedar Ridge Country Club in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma, a suburb southeast of Tulsa. In oppressive heat, Jan Stephenson won her third and final major championship with a score of 290 (+6), a stroke ahead of runners-up JoAnne Carner and The low amateur was 18-year-old Heather Farr of Phoenix, who tied for eleventh place ==Past champions in the field== ===Made the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || R3 || R4 || Total||To par||Finish |- |align=left|JoAnne Carner||align=left| || 1971, 1976 ||81||70||72||68||291||+7||T2 |- |align=left|Pat Bradley||align=left| || 1981||72||76||71||76||295||+11||T8 |- |align=left| Amy Alcott ||align=left||| 1980 ||75||74||71||76||296||+12||T11 |-||77|| |align=left|Sandra Haynie||align=left| || 1974 ||74||74||74||77||299||+15||T21 |- |align=left|Hollis Stacy||align=left| || 1977, 1978 ||78||74||72||78||302||+18||T32 |- |align=left| Sandra Palmer ||align=left| || 1975 ||77||77||81||74||309||+19||57 |- |} Source: ===Missed the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || Total || To par |- |align=left| Jerilyn Britz ||align=left| || 1979||78||79||157||+15 |- |align=left|Janet Anderson||align=left| || 1982|||82||76||158||+16 |- |align=left|Susie Berning ||align=left| ||1968, 1972, 1973 ||79||80||159||+17 |} Source: ==Final leaderboard== Sunday, July 31, 1983 {| class="wikitable" !
